name: William Magill

text: We like wood fired pizza and this was close to our hotel, so we decided to give it a try. I'm glad we did. Our pizzas and salads were made to order while we watched ( kinda like MO's) . Pizzas are thin so they cook up fast. Our food was all …More

name: Jane Stormer
text: Love this place, but I always forget that the pizza cooks so fast that the raw veggie toppings don't always fully cook through. The spicy sauce is excellent, and the quality of the ingredients is also good. I appreciate that there is at least one local beer on tap.

text: My husband was treated very rudely today and was denied service because he wouldn’t wear a mask due to health reasons. You’ve lost our business which is a shame because we always enjoyed your food.
